content.question: According to the levels of processing model, in which scenario would the person have the most accurate recall of new information due to deep processing?

choices.label: Natalie, who repeats the information to herself over and over
Janelle, who relates the information to her own experiences
Joy, who reviews the information in the same order every time
Elizabeth, who writes down all the relevant information in her notebook

content.answer: Janelle, who relates the information to her own experiences

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
